question: For the reaction, <katex>$A\rightleftharpoons B$</katex> <katex>$E_{a}=50~kJ~mol^{-1}$</katex> and <katex>$\Delta H=-20kJ~mol^{-1}.$</katex> When a catalyst is added, <katex>$E_{a}$</katex> decreases by <katex>$10~kJ~mol^{-1}$</katex> What is the <katex>$E_{a}$</katex> for the backward reaction in the presence of catalyst?
